original: 有言：出兵無度，十一次北伐國力疲弊，致蜀衰亡。有言：後蜀漢佞臣專權，無奈局勢下仍奮鬥不懈。
text: There is a saying:  Excessive dispatch of troops, eleven Northern Expeditions, national strength and weakness, leading to the decline of Shu. It is said:  The post-Shu Han renchen has the authority, but still struggles unremittingly under the helpless situation.
